name: KOReader on Obsidian
description: This is a plugin build on top of another plugin from Federico "Edo" Granata (https://github.com/Edo78/obsidian-koreader-sync). It has not been updated for a long time and i wanted to build my own for my specific use case. This plugin syncs highlights and notes taken in KOReader, tested on Kobo Libra 2.
author: Johan Baltazar
